blocks.name: lvecdimfi
blocks.content: Finite version of ~ lvecdim which does not require the axiom of choice. The axiom of choice is used in ~ acsmapd , which is required in the infinite case. Suggested by Gérard Lang. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 24-May-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm lvecdimfi(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cen, c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(clbs, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, clvec))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
} = {
  mreexfidimd(hs2, hs0, hs1, c0, c1, cfv(clss, c3), cfv(cbs, c3), cfv(cmrc, cfv(clss, c3)), cfv(cmri, cfv(clss, c3)), w0)
  acsmred(cfv(clss, c3), cfv(cbs, c3), w0)
  simpld(w0, wcel(cfv(clss, c3), cfv(cacs, cfv(cbs, c3))), wral(hs2, cpw(cfv(cbs, c3)), wral(hs0, cfv(cbs, c3), wral(hs1, cdif(cfv(cfv(cmrc, cfv(clss, c3)), cun(cv(hs2), csn(cv(hs0)))), cfv(cfv(cmrc, cfv(clss, c3)), cv(hs2))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(cmrc, cfv(clss, c3)), cun(cv(hs2), csn(cv(hs1)))))))))
  simprd(w0, wral(hs2, cpw(cfv(cbs, c3)), wral(hs0, cfv(cbs, c3), wral(hs1, cdif(cfv(cfv(cmrc, cfv(clss, c3)), cun(cv(hs2), csn(cv(hs0)))), cfv(cfv(cmrc, cfv(clss, c3)), cv(hs2))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(cmrc, cfv(clss, c3)), cun(cv(hs2), csn(cv(hs1)))))))), wcel(cfv(clss, c3), cfv(cacs, cfv(cbs, c3))))
  syl(w0, wa(wcel(cfv(clss, c3), cfv(cacs, cfv(cbs, c3))), wral(hs2, cpw(cfv(cbs, c3)), wral(hs0, cfv(cbs, c3), wral(hs1, cdif(cfv(cfv(cmrc, cfv(clss, c3)), cun(cv(hs2), csn(cv(hs0)))), cfv(cfv(cmrc, cfv(clss, c3)), cv(hs2))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(cmrc, cfv(clss, c3)), cun(cv(hs2), csn(cv(hs1))))))))), wcel(c3, clvec))
  lssacsex(hs2, hs0, hs1, c3, cfv(clss, c3), cfv(cbs, c3), cfv(cmrc, cfv(clss, c3)))
  simpld(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(cmri, cfv(clss, c3))), wceq(cfv(cfv(cmrc, cfv(clss, c3)), c0), cfv(cbs, c3)))
  simpld(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(cmri, cfv(clss, c3))), wceq(cfv(cfv(cmrc, cfv(clss, c3)), c1), cfv(cbs, c3)))
  eqtr4d(cfv(cfv(cmrc, cfv(clss, c3)), c0), cfv(cfv(cmrc, cfv(clss, c3)), c1), cfv(cbs, c3), w0)
  simprd(w0, wceq(cfv(cfv(cmrc, cfv(clss, c3)), c0), cfv(cbs, c3)), wcel(c0, cfv(cmri, cfv(clss, c3))))
  syl2anc(w0, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cmri, cfv(clss, c3))), wceq(cfv(cfv(cmrc, cfv(clss, c3)), c0), cfv(cbs, c3))), wcel(c3, clvec), wcel(c0, c2))
  biimpa(wcel(c3, clvec), wcel(c0, c2), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cmri, cfv(clss, c3))), wceq(cfv(cfv(cmrc, cfv(clss, c3)), c0), cfv(cbs, c3))))
  lbsacsbs(c3, c0, c2, cfv(cmri, cfv(clss, c3)), cfv(cmrc, cfv(clss, c3)), cfv(cbs, c3), cfv(clss, c3))
  simprd(w0, wceq(cfv(cfv(cmrc, cfv(clss, c3)), c1), cfv(cbs, c3)), wcel(c1, cfv(cmri, cfv(clss, c3))))
  syl2anc(w0, wa(wcel(c1, cfv(cmri, cfv(clss, c3))), wceq(cfv(cfv(cmrc, cfv(clss, c3)), c1), cfv(cbs, c3))), wcel(c3, clvec), wcel(c1, c2))
  biimpa(wcel(c3, clvec), wcel(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c1, cfv(cmri, cfv(clss, c3))), wceq(cfv(cfv(cmrc, cfv(clss, c3)), c1), cfv(cbs, c3))))
  lbsacsbs(c3, c1, c2, cfv(cmri, cfv(clss, c3)), cfv(cmrc, cfv(clss, c3)), cfv(cbs, c3), cfv(clss, c3))
  eqid(cfv(clss, c3))
  eqid(cfv(cmrc, cfv(clss, c3)))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c3))
  eqid(cfv(cmri, cfv(clss, c3)))
  diff.hs2.s(hs0)
  diff.hs2.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs2.c(cfv(cbs, c3))
  diff.hs2.c(cfv(cmrc, cfv(clss, c3)))
  diff.hs2.c(cfv(cmri, cfv(clss, c3)))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cbs, c3))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cmrc, cfv(clss, c3)))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cmri, cfv(clss, c3)))
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cbs, c3))
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cmrc, cfv(clss, c3)))
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cmri, cfv(clss, c3)))
  diff.hs2.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs2.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm lvecdimfi(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0[≅]c1)
  ⊣ c2 =(LBasis ` c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ LVec)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Fin)
} = {
  mreexfidimd(hs2, hs0, hs1, c0, c1, (LSubSp ` c3), (Base ` c3), (mrCls `(LSubSp ` c3)), (mrInd `(LSubSp ` c3)), w0)
  acsmred((LSubSp ` c3), (Base ` c3), w0)
  simpld(w0, (LSubSp ` c3)∈(ACS `(Base ` c3)), ∀(hs2 ∈ P((Base ` c3)), ∀(hs0 ∈(Base ` c3), ∀(hs1 ∈(((mrCls `(LSubSp ` c3))`(hs2 ⋃ { hs0 }))\((mrCls `(LSubSp ` c3))` hs2)), hs0 ∈((mrCls `(LSubSp ` c3))`(hs2 ⋃ { hs1 }))))))
  simprd(w0, ∀(hs2 ∈ P((Base ` c3)), ∀(hs0 ∈(Base ` c3), ∀(hs1 ∈(((mrCls `(LSubSp ` c3))`(hs2 ⋃ { hs0 }))\((mrCls `(LSubSp ` c3))` hs2)), hs0 ∈((mrCls `(LSubSp ` c3))`(hs2 ⋃ { hs1 }))))), (LSubSp ` c3)∈(ACS `(Base ` c3)))
  syl(w0, ((LSubSp ` c3)∈(ACS `(Base ` c3))∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ P((Base ` c3)), ∀(hs0 ∈(Base ` c3), ∀(hs1 ∈(((mrCls `(LSubSp ` c3))`(hs2 ⋃ { hs0 }))\((mrCls `(LSubSp ` c3))` hs2)), hs0 ∈((mrCls `(LSubSp ` c3))`(hs2 ⋃ { hs1 })))))), c3 ∈ LVec)
  lssacsex(hs2, hs0, hs1, c3, (LSubSp ` c3), (Base ` c3), (mrCls `(LSubSp ` c3)))
  simpld(w0, c0 ∈(mrInd `(LSubSp ` c3)), ((mrCls `(LSubSp ` c3))` c0)=(Base ` c3))
  simpld(w0, c1 ∈(mrInd `(LSubSp ` c3)), ((mrCls `(LSubSp ` c3))` c1)=(Base ` c3))
  eqtr4d(((mrCls `(LSubSp ` c3))` c0), ((mrCls `(LSubSp ` c3))` c1), (Base ` c3), w0)
  simprd(w0, ((mrCls `(LSubSp ` c3))` c0)=(Base ` c3), c0 ∈(mrInd `(LSubSp ` c3)))
  syl2anc(w0, (c0 ∈(mrInd `(LSubSp ` c3))∧((mrCls `(LSubSp ` c3))` c0)=(Base ` c3)), c3 ∈ LVec, c0 ∈ c2)
  biimpa(c3 ∈ LVec, c0 ∈ c2, (c0 ∈(mrInd `(LSubSp ` c3))∧((mrCls `(LSubSp ` c3))` c0)=(Base ` c3)))
  lbsacsbs(c3, c0, c2, (mrInd `(LSubSp ` c3)), (mrCls `(LSubSp ` c3)), (Base ` c3), (LSubSp ` c3))
  simprd(w0, ((mrCls `(LSubSp ` c3))` c1)=(Base ` c3), c1 ∈(mrInd `(LSubSp ` c3)))
  syl2anc(w0, (c1 ∈(mrInd `(LSubSp ` c3))∧((mrCls `(LSubSp ` c3))` c1)=(Base ` c3)), c3 ∈ LVec, c1 ∈ c2)
  biimpa(c3 ∈ LVec, c1 ∈ c2, (c1 ∈(mrInd `(LSubSp ` c3))∧((mrCls `(LSubSp ` c3))` c1)=(Base ` c3)))
  lbsacsbs(c3, c1, c2, (mrInd `(LSubSp ` c3)), (mrCls `(LSubSp ` c3)), (Base ` c3), (LSubSp ` c3))
  eqid((LSubSp ` c3))
  eqid((mrCls `(LSubSp ` c3)))
  eqid((Base ` c3))
  eqid((mrInd `(LSubSp ` c3)))
  diff.hs2.s(hs0)
  diff.hs2.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs2.c((Base ` c3))
  diff.hs2.c((mrCls `(LSubSp ` c3)))
  diff.hs2.c((mrInd `(LSubSp ` c3)))
  diff.hs0.c((Base ` c3))
  diff.hs0.c((mrCls `(LSubSp ` c3)))
  diff.hs0.c((mrInd `(LSubSp ` c3)))
  diff.hs1.c((Base ` c3))
  diff.hs1.c((mrCls `(LSubSp ` c3)))
  diff.hs1.c((mrInd `(LSubSp ` c3)))
  diff.hs2.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs2.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
}
